fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A picture purported to show the Royal Liverpool University Hospital as unfinished because of the collapse of government contractor Carillion. But the image was of the adjacent new Clatterbridge Cancer Centre, which has a different contractor and is set to open in May 2020 (New hospitals still unfinished after contractor collapse, 16 January, page 41). • Other recently corrected articles include: UK’s attempt to repatriate British children from Syria to be rejected Inside the odyssey: taking a closer look at Stanley Kubrick’s 2001 Technology in 2050: will it save humanity – or destroy us? ‘A new dimension of humanity’: Auschwitz comes to TV, in colour
